column1: Uchi////Great HH place!!! Do come early as a line forms for the HH. The food is excellent and would recommend for a GNO or date night. I believe the update their HH menu from time to time
column2: but would recommend getting everything on their HH
column3: and then order more of the items you love. The plates are pretty small and not shareable if your party is greater than 2.
